border-radius.description: Modify the border radius of the pricing card. Use multiple values for individual radii: eg. 0 16 0 16

background-color.description: Change this token to change the background color of the default pricing card.

icon-color.description: Change this token to change the icon color in the default pricing card.

list-color.description: Change this token to change the font-color of the list in pricing card.

background-color.description: Change this token to change the background color of the muted pricing card

icon-color.description: Change this token to modify the icon color of the muted pricing card.

padding-x.description: Modify this token to change the padding-x of the pricing card

padding-y.description: Modify this token to change the padding-y of the pricing card

sub-title-color.description: Change this token to change the font-color of the sub-title of the pricing card

title-color.description: Change this token to change the font-color of the title pricing card.

container-bg-image.description: Add an image address pointing to a public url

container-overlay.description: The section container has a separate background and overlay. You could use the overlay to add a gradient or opacity layer on top of your background color or image fill.

source.description: Add a public url of an image

container-background-color.description: Every section container can have a unique background color or image. On top of the background a gradient or opactive layer can be applied. Use the container-overlay token to achieve this.
